Subject: Request for Nawal Mohammad : 20. Logistics Complaints - [#SR-1073868] Appointment Number 0000133989

 

Dear Nawal,

 

Valid claim 

As per the result of inventory verification and rechecking, we have noticed discrepancies in our stock only for the below claimed references.

 

Reference # 020416842036 – 1 Pc Excess.

Reference # 020416842038 – 1 Pc Excess.

Reference # 020416910283 – 1 Pc Excess.

 

Please provide Dummy DI in order to close the claim.

 

As per the result of quality rechecking, we didn’t find any damages in our stock for the damaged claim references.

 

Please proceed with the insurance.

 

Claim Ref # 2092/CC24/235

 

Regards

MADAN KHANAL​​​​

(م). قبل فتح أي مرفقات، يرجى التحقق منها وفحصها من الفيروسات والعيوب.
